activities:
Registrant provides virtual private servers, and related services, to customers from the United States as well as Europe.  To provide the service, the registrant obtains credit card and other personally identifying information from customers.  The registrant processes the information for commercial purposes only.  
In the event that registrant employs individuals as independent contractors or employees in the European Union, the registrant will collect, transfer and use human resources data for purposes of payroll, benefits and services.  It will use such information only for the required commercial purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The EU Data Privacy Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
